scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.build:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run --bun vite build --ssrManifest --outDir dist/client
scripts.build:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run --bun vite build --ssr src/entryServer.tsx --outDir dist/server
scripts.prerender: bun run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun ./tools/prerenderPages.ts
scripts.preview: bun run prerender && cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun ./tools/staticServer
scripts.lint: bun run --bun biome lint --write && bun run --bun biome format --write
